imodelstyles: Hey there @ind0ctrination . I'm so, extremely sorry you had to go through this. I'm a 22 year old pre-op trans girl, so I can imagine what you must have felt. I don't know if you're in a vulnerable state right now or not, and what I'm about to say stands regardless of how vulnerable you are when you read it (if you read it)... you're beautiful, wonderful, amazing, lovable and worth being happy and respected. "Wildflowers are the toughest of all flowers, because they grow in the desert, the toughest place on Earth. Though as soon as they get the chance, they reach for the sun and bloom because they are survivors." - Carla Bennett (Nikita). Tears are coming into my eyes as I write this for the amount of love and respect I have for you and for the five years of abuse that I've endured. I truly hope you find someone who sees you for the beautiful wildflower that you are.  Tons of love from someone who is trying to convince herself despite daily tearing up that she has no feelings and isn't worth anyone's love.  A fucked up weirdo named Aanya.
